import React, { Component } from 'react'; import classes from './Education.module.css'; import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import "animate.css/animate.min.css"; import { MdSchool } from 'react-icons/md'; import { MdWork } from 'react-icons/md'; import { FaSchool } from 'react-icons/fa'; class Education extends Component { render() { return (
MY JOURNEY
{/*

Experience July(2021)-Present

I am currently working as cyber secutity student at cyber security (The National Cybersecurity Student Association is a resource hub to enhance the educational and professional development of cybersecurity students through activities, networking and collaboration) and boosting my professional skills.

 */}

Undergraduation at OCT,Bhopal2020-2024

I am pursuing Computer Science and Engineering cyber security from OCT,Bhopal

CGPA - 9.2 percentile (3rd sem) .

High Schooling 2018-2020

I have completed my higher education from Hasanpur college hasanpur road samstipur with major subjects as Physics,Chemistry & Maths with 63.4% merit in BSEB board.

Secondry Schooling 2018

I have completed my higher education from UTKRAMIT M S GUDAR, BEGUSARAI with major subjects as Science, Mathematics & Social Science with 60.0% merit in BSEb board.

Internship

Completed one month Clifford Chance Cyber Security Global Virtual Internship
) } } export default Education;
